verses.verse: And <WG2532> there was given <WG1325> me <WG3427> a reed <WG2563> like <WG3364> unto a rod <WG4464>: and one32, 2476 said <WG3004>, Rise <WG1453>, and <WG2532> measure <WG3354> the temple <WG3485> of God <WG2316>, and <WG2532> the altar <WG2379>, and <WG2532> them that worship4352, 1722 therein <WG846>.

And <WG2532> I will give <WG1325> unto <WG1417> my <WG3450> two <WG1417> witnesses <WG3144>, and <WG2532> they shall prophesy <WG4395> a thousand <WG5507> two hundred <WG1250> and threescore <WG1835> days <WG2250>, clothed <WG4016> in sackcloth <WG4526>.
These <WG3778> are <WG1526> the two <WG1417> olive trees <WG1636> and <WG2532> the two <WG1417> candlesticks <WG3087>, standing <WG2476> before <WG1799> the Lord <WG2316> of the earth <WG1093>.

And <WG2532> if <WG1487> any man <WG5100> desireth <WG2309> to hurt <WG91> them <WG846>, fire <WG4442> proceedeth <WG1607> out of <WG1537> their <WG846> mouth <WG4750> and <WG2532> devoureth <WG2719> their <WG846> enemies <WG2190>; and <WG2532> if <WG1487> any man <WG5100> shall desire <WG2309> to hurt <WG91> them <WG846>, in this manner <WG3779> must <WG1163> he <WG846> be killed <WG615>.

These <WG3778> have <WG2192> the power <WG1849> to shut <WG2808> the heaven <WG3772>, that <WG2443> it <WG5205> rain <WG1026> not <WG3361> during <WG1722> the days <WG2250> of their <WG846> prophecy <WG4394>: and <WG2532> they have <WG2192> power <WG1849> over <WG1909> the waters <WG5204> to turn <WG4762> them <WG846> into <WG1519> blood <WG129>, and <WG2532> to smite <WG3960> the earth <WG1093> with every <WG3956> plague <WG4127>, as often <WG3740> as <WG1437> they shall desire <WG2309>.

And <WG2532> when <WG3752> they shall have finished <WG5055> their <WG846> testimony <WG3141>, the beast <WG2342> that cometh <WG305> up out of <WG1537> the abyss <WG12> shall make <WG4160> war <WG4171> with <WG3326> them <WG846>, and <WG2532> overcome <WG3528> them <WG846>, and <WG2532> kill <WG615> them <WG846>.

And <WG2532> their <WG846> dead bodies <WG4430> lie in <WG1909> the street <WG4113> of the great <WG3173> city <WG4172>, which <WG3748> spiritually <WG4153> is called <WG2564> Sodom <WG4670> and <WG2532> Egypt <WG125>, where <WG3699> also <WG2532> their <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> was crucified <WG4717>.

And <WG2532> from among <WG1537> the peoples <WG2992> and <WG2532> tribes <WG5443> and <WG2532> tongues <WG1100> and <WG2532> nations <WG1484> do men look <WG991> upon their <WG846> dead bodies <WG4430> three <WG5140> days <WG2250> and <WG2532> a half <WG2255>, and2532, 863 suffer <WG863> not <WG3756> their <WG846> dead bodies <WG4430> to be laid <WG5087> in <WG1519> a tomb <WG3418>.

And <WG2532> they <WG3588> that dwell <WG2730> on <WG1909> the earth <WG1093> rejoice <WG5463> over <WG1909> them <WG846>, and <WG2532> make merry <WG2165>; and <WG2532> they shall send <WG3992> gifts <WG1435> one to another <WG240>; because <WG3754> these <WG3778> two <WG1417> prophets <WG4396> tormented <WG928> them <WG3588> that dwell <WG2730> on <WG1909> the earth <WG1093>.

And <WG2532> after <WG3326> the three <WG5140> days <WG2250> and <WG2532> a half <WG2255> the breath <WG4151> of <WG1537> life <WG2222> from God <WG2316> entered <WG1525> into <WG1909> them <WG846>, and <WG2532> they stood <WG2476> upon <WG1909> their <WG846> feet <WG4228>; and <WG2532> great <WG3173> fear <WG5401> fell <WG4098> upon <WG1909> them <WG3588> that beheld <WG2334> them <WG846>.

And <WG2532> they heard <WG191> a great <WG3173> voice <WG5456> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772> saying <WG3004> unto them <WG846>, Come up <WG305> hither <WG5602>. And <WG2532> they went up <WG305> into <WG1519> heaven <WG3772> in <WG1722> the cloud <WG3507>; and <WG2532> their <WG846> enemies <WG2190> beheld <WG2334> them <WG846>.

And <WG2532> in <WG1722> that <WG1565> hour <WG5610> there <WG1096> was a great <WG3173> earthquake <WG4578>, and <WG2532> the tenth part <WG1182> of the city <WG4172> fell <WG4098>; and <WG2532> there were killed615, 3686 in <WG1722> the earthquake <WG4578> seven <WG2033> thousand <WG5505> persons <WG444>: and <WG2532> the rest <WG3062> were <WG1096> affrighted <WG1719>, and <WG2532> gave <WG1325> glory <WG1391> to the God <WG2316> of heaven <WG3772>.
The second <WG1208> Woe <WG3759> is past <WG565>: behold <WG2400>, the third <WG5154> Woe <WG3759> cometh <WG2064> quickly <WG5035>.

And <WG2532> the seventh <WG1442> angel <WG32> sounded <WG4537>; and <WG2532> there followed <WG1096> great <WG3173> voices <WG5456> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>, and <WG2532> they said <WG932>, The kingdom of the world <WG2889> is become <WG1096> the kingdom of our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962>, and <WG2532> of his <WG846> Christ <WG5547>: and <WG2532> he shall reign <WG936> for <WG1519> ever <WG165> and ever <WG165>.

And <WG2532> the four <WG5064> and <WG2532> twenty <WG1501> elders <WG4245>, who sit <WG2521> before <WG1799> God <WG2316> on <WG1909> their <WG846> thrones <WG2362>, fell <WG4098> upon <WG1909> their <WG846> faces <WG4383> and <WG2532> worshipped <WG4352> God <WG2316>,

saying <WG3004>, We give <WG2168> thee <WG4671> thanks <WG2168>, O Lord <WG2962> God <WG2316>, the Almighty <WG3841>, who art <WG5607> and <WG2532> who wast <WG2258>; 2532, Exodus64 because <WG3754> thou hast taken <WG2983> thy <WG4675> great <WG3173> power <WG1411>, and <WG2532> didst reign <WG936>.

And <WG2532> the nations <WG1484> were wroth <WG3710>, and <WG2532> thy <WG4675> wrath <WG3709> came <WG2064>, and <WG2532> the time <WG2540> of the dead <WG3498> to be judged <WG2919>, and <WG2532> the time to give <WG1325> their reward <WG3408> to thy <WG4675> servants <WG1401> the prophets <WG4396>, and <WG2532> to the saints <WG40>, and <WG2532> to them <WG3588> that fear <WG5399> thy <WG4675> name <WG3686>, the small <WG3398> and <WG2532> the great <WG3173>; and <WG2532> to destroy <WG1311> them <WG3588> that destroy <WG1311> the earth <WG1093>.

And <WG2532> there was opened <WG455> the temple <WG3485> of God <WG2316> that is in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>; and <WG2532> there was seen <WG3700> in <WG1722> his <WG846> temple <WG3485> the ark <WG2787> of his <WG846> covenant <WG1242>; and <WG2532> there followed <WG1096> lightnings <WG796>, and <WG2532> voices <WG5456>, and <WG2532> thunders <WG1027>, and <WG2532> an earthquake <WG4578>, and <WG2532> great <WG3173> hail <WG5464>.
